arch=arm
baudrate=115200
board=odroid-c4
board_name=odroid-c4
boot_mtd=booti
bootdelay=20
cpu=armv8
fdt_addr=0x08008000
dtb_emmc_block=10010
dtb_max_blk_count=c8
loadaddr=0x1000000
kernel_emmc_block=1010
kernel_max_blk_count=F000
ramdisk_addr=0x13000000
ramdisk_emmc_block=100D8
ramdisk_max_blk_count=7D000
fdtfile=amlogic/meson-sm1-odroid-c4.dtb
set_bootargs=setenv bootargs "console=${console},${baudrate} root=/dev/ram rw earlycon loglevel=7"
loadimage=usb read ${loadaddr} ${kernel_emmc_block} ${kernel_max_blk_count};
loadfdt=usb read ${fdt_addr} ${dtb_emmc_block} ${dtb_max_blk_count};
loadramdisk=usb read ${ramdisk_addr} ${ramdisk_emmc_block} ${ramdisk_max_blk_count};
bootcmd=usb start; run loadimage;run loadramdisk;run loadfdt; ${boot_mtd} ${loadaddr} ${ramdisk_addr} ${fdt_addr};
scriptaddr=0x08000000
soc=meson
stderr=vidconsole,serial
stdin=vidconsole,serial
stdout=vidconsole,serial
vendor=amlogic
